faqs.q: How many calories in 1 tbsp maple syrup?
Is maple syrup high in sugar?
faqs.a: Yes, about 12 g of sugars per 1 tbsp, all from natural sources.

faqs.q: Does maple syrup have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: Negligible—0 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How many carbs in 1 tbsp maple syrup?
faqs.a: Around 13.4 g total carbs, with 0 g fiber.

faqs.q: What's the difference in calories between maple syrup grades?
faqs.a: Minimal variation; all grades are ~52 kcal per tbsp, but darker grades may have more minerals.
